related.meaning: setting a question (for an exam, quiz, etc.)

lessons.japanese: テレビを見た後で宿題するよ。
lessons.english: I'll do my homework after I watch television.

lessons.japanese: テレビ見てから宿題するね。
lessons.english: I'll do my homework after I watch television.

lessons.japanese: テレビを見た後で宿題するよ。
lessons.english: I'll do my homework after I watch television.

lessons.japanese: 宿題するの忘れんなよ。いいか？
lessons.english: Don't forget to do your homework, okay?

lessons.japanese: 私んちで、一緒に研究課題するのはどう？
lessons.english: How about we go to my place to work on the project together?
